span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt.迷茫，困惑： use to be at a loss as to what to say, think, or do: perplex
【例】 I was nonplussed by his openly expressed admiration of me. 我被她公开表现的仰慕弄得很窘迫。
【近】 confound, confuse, discomfit, disconcert, discountenance, mortify, abash, faze, fluster
【记】 non不 + plus 加→不会加，不会加法，考G数学时不会加法会很窘的
